paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the external validation of the Kumamoto criteria in transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy screening, including a case of a TTR variant.

patients.demographics: Age not specified, sex not specified

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with hATTR-CM by confirmation of TTR amyloid deposition and TTR gene mutation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient had been diagnosed with hATTR-CM by confirmation of TTR amyloid deposition and TTR gene mutation (Tyr114His).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This is the only TTR variant mentioned in the paper.
key_quotes: One patient had been diagnosed with hATTR-CM by confirmation of TTR amyloid deposition and TTR gene mutation (Tyr114His).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one TTR variant was reported in the paper.
